short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'Terrorists' with 'The Nation of Eastasia'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you having trouble understanding this new world we live in where everyone is a terrorist? Not sure who to trust? The Unabridged Newspeak Dictionary can help by automatically translating news articles and other websites into the version of Newspeak approved by the US Federal Government.
